```{r,echo=F,out.extra='',comment='', message=FALSE , warning=FALSE}
#load source code:
source("import1.r");source("tdrplus.R");require(ggplot2)
PaluConf_tdr= tdr_malaria()
#extract years and select obs starting from 2009:
PaluConf_tdr[,years:=as.numeric(substr(code,1,4))]
PaluConf_tdr=PaluConf_tdr[years>=2009]

#melting:
malaria= PaluConf_tdr[,list(code,deb_sem,malaria_cases)]
setnames(malaria,"malaria_cases","value")
malaria[,Légende:="Paludisme TDR+"]
fievre= PaluConf_tdr[,list(code,deb_sem,SyndF)]
setnames(fievre,"SyndF","value")
fievre[,Légende:="Fièvres"]
PaluConf_tdr=rbind(malaria, fievre)
PaluConf_tdr$deb_sem=as.Date(PaluConf_tdr$deb_sem)
PaluConf_tdr[,weeks:=week(deb_sem)]
setnames(PaluConf_tdr,"deb_sem","Date")
d= ggplot(data=PaluConf_tdr,
          aes(x=Date,y=value,fill=Légende,colour=Légende)) 
d=d + geom_line(alpha=0.6)
debut_annee=as.numeric(unique(PaluConf_tdr[weeks==1,Date]))
d= d + geom_vline(xintercept = debut_annee,
                  linetype=4,colour="purple")
d=d + ggtitle(label="Fièvres et Paludisme dans le réseau sentinel")
d=d + xlab("Date") + ylab("Cas de Fièvres et Paludisme")
d
```
